## **Timeline** 

-   Introduction to the assignment (\~5 min)

-   Prepare for peer teaching (\~40 min)

-   Peer teaching on hyperketonemia in dairy cows (\~ 45 min)

    -   Group 1 - \> focus on detection & monitoring ( -10 min)

    -   Group 2 -\> focus on treatment ( -10 min)

    -   Group 3 -\> focus on prevention ( -10 min)

    -   Group 4 -\> focus on novel insights ( -10 min)

## Goal of this class

-   Learn by doing
    -   how to apply knowledge on subclinical ketosis to diagnose and treat affected dairy cows effectively.
    -   how to analyze risk factors and effects of subclinical ketosis on dairy cow health and productivity.
    -   how to evaluate diagnostic tools and **non-nutritional management strategies** for subclinical ketosis.
